page.title: 05NEEDLES LIGHTHOUSE W WIGHT
page.content:
The Needles lighthouse is very important because it helps ships at sea to find their way into and out of the harbours of the Solent.It is very tall and has red and white circles round it.The lighthouse is always occupied by 3 men who work for one month at a time.They get to the lighthouse by boat,unless the sea is very rough when they use a helicopter. The colours of the light are red and white,when the ships see the red light it shows that the ship is in danger so they must change course until they see the white point of the light.
Nicholas Gibbs 9 years
